attributes.action: request the Editor to reinstate the daily sports feature in the Financial Times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As part of the rebranding of the Financial Times the Editor has decided to no longer provide a daily feature on the latest sports news. He took this decision without any consultation with his readers. Sport reporting has been a small but important element of the Financial Times, giving its readers a quick and convenient update on the latest sporting news.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
